name: Improved Bull Rush

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Str 13, Power Attack, base attack bonus +1.

sections.text: You do not provoke an attack of opportunity when performing a bull rush combat maneuver. In addition, you receive a +2 bonus on checks made to bull rush a foe. You also receive a +2 bonus to your Combat Maneuver Defense whenever an opponent tries to bull rush you.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.text: You provoke an attack of opportunity when performing a bull rush combat maneuver.
sections.name: Normal

description: You are skilled at pushing your foes around.
